subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Michel fed Tesho Akindele for a goal and then added one of his own later in the first half, and F.C. Dallas beat visiting New York City F.C., 2-1, on Saturday night.
snippet: Michel fed Tesho Akindele for a goal and then added one of his own later in the first half, and F.C. Dallas beat visiting New York City F.C., 2-1, on Saturday night.
